isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - SPEEDOMETER/TACHOMETER, GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 9800 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - CLUSTER ILLUMINATION AND WARNING LIGHT BULBS

svcproc.title: CLUSTER ILLUMINATION AND WARNING LIGHT BULBS
svcproc.para: Light bulbs can be changed by removing the front cluster cover and pulling the bulbs straight out of the sockets.

The bulbs can also be removed and re-installed by removing the cluster from the instrument panel and, from the rear of the cluster, rotating the bulb and socket assembly counterclockwise. The bulb can then be removed from the socket by pulling it straight out (Figure 14).
